readable.title: 3240351042_5d29c94b0e
readable.content: A biker rider jumping high over a dirt hill and seems to be higher than an electric pole . A motor biker gets massive air off a dirt jump A person jumps a bicycle off a large dirt ramp . Brown ramp structure with a person on ski 's in midair . The cyclist is airborne on his bike as it makes a jump between two mounds of earth .
